titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Town of Southampton School District No. 1 daily school registers 1978.126
titlestmt.author: Nicholas Pavlik
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 11:10:25 +0000.

did.unittitle: Town of Southampton School District No. 1 daily school registers

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Town of Southampton School District No. 1 (Southampton, N.Y. : Town)

did.abstract: Three daily school registers of the Town of Southampton School District No. 1 in Suffolk County, N.Y. for the school years lasting from 1878 to 1879, 1887 to 1888, and 1888 to 1889. The registers include lists of students over the age of five and under the age of 21 in the district, lists of the parents or guardians of each student, names of the towns in which the students reside, each student's date of enrollment, and records of attendance.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition unknown. Formally accessioned in 1978.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Town of Southampton School District No. 1 daily school registers, 1978.126, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.
